name: Oasis Luxury Med Spa - UGC Video Generator

parameters.formTitle: Oasis Luxury Med Spa - Video Generator
parameters.formDescription: Create engaging UGC-style videos for social media promoting med spa services

values.placeholder: Leave blank to auto-generate, or enter your own script

parameters.jsCode:
// Character rotation - cycles through diverse med spa presenter characters
// Uses a simple counter stored in static data to rotate

// ElevenLabs Voice IDs:
// Female voices for med spa presenters
const VOICE_RACHEL = "21m00Tcm4TlvDq8ikWAM"; // Rachel - warm, professional
const VOICE_BELLA = "EXAVITQu4vr4xnSDxMaL";  // Bella - soft, elegant
const VOICE_ELLI = "MF3mGyEYCl7XYWbV9V6O";   // Elli - young, friendly

const characters = [
  {
    id: 1,
    gender: "female",
    ethnicity: "Hispanic/Latina",
    hairColor: "dark brown",
    hairStyle: "long and sleek with soft waves",
    skinTone: "warm olive",
    eyeColor: "brown",
    outfit: "elegant white lab coat over a soft pink blouse",
    name: "Isabella",
    voiceId: VOICE_RACHEL,
    role: "Lead Aesthetician"
  },
  {
    id: 2,
    gender: "female",
    ethnicity: "African American",
    hairColor: "black",
    hairStyle: "styled in a chic updo",
    skinTone: "rich brown with a radiant glow",
    eyeColor: "dark brown",
    outfit: "sleek black blouse with gold accessories",
    name: "Jasmine",
    voiceId: VOICE_BELLA,
    role: "Skincare Specialist"
  },
  {
    id: 3,
    gender: "female",
    ethnicity: "Caucasian",
    hairColor: "blonde",
    hairStyle: "shoulder-length with a polished blowout",
    skinTone: "fair with a healthy glow",
    eyeColor: "blue",
    outfit: "chic cream blazer with a simple gold necklace",
    name: "Madison",
    voiceId: VOICE_ELLI,
    role: "Wellness Consultant"
  },
  {
    id: 4,
    gender: "female",
    ethnicity: "Asian",
    hairColor: "black",
    hairStyle: "straight and glossy, past the shoulders",
    skinTone: "light golden with flawless complexion",
    eyeColor: "dark brown",
    outfit: "modern teal scrubs with a luxury spa badge",
    name: "Mei",
    voiceId: VOICE_RACHEL,
    role: "Laser Technician"
  },
  {
    id: 5,
    gender: "female",
    ethnicity: "Middle Eastern",
    hairColor: "dark brown",
    hairStyle: "voluminous curls styled to one side",
    skinTone: "warm olive with a dewy finish",
    eyeColor: "hazel",
    outfit: "elegant white blouse with pearl earrings",
    name: "Layla",
    voiceId: VOICE_BELLA,
    role: "Injectable Specialist"
  },
  {
    id: 6,
    gender: "female",
    ethnicity: "Mixed race",
    hairColor: "caramel highlighted",
    hairStyle: "beachy waves, effortlessly styled",
    skinTone: "caramel with a sun-kissed glow",
    eyeColor: "green",
    outfit: "soft lavender medical aesthetic uniform",
    name: "Aria",
    voiceId: VOICE_ELLI,
    role: "Body Contouring Expert"
  },
  {
    id: 7,
    gender: "female",
    ethnicity: "South Asian",
    hairColor: "dark brown",
    hairStyle: "long braid swept over one shoulder",
    skinTone: "warm brown with a luminous finish",
    eyeColor: "dark brown",
    outfit: "designer white coat with rose gold accents",
    name: "Priya",
    voiceId: VOICE_RACHEL,
    role: "Skin Rejuvenation Specialist"
  },
  {
    id: 8,
    gender: "female",
    ethnicity: "Caucasian",
    hairColor: "auburn red",
    hairStyle: "soft curls pinned half-up",
    skinTone: "fair with light freckles",
    eyeColor: "green",
    outfit: "elegant sage green blouse with minimalist jewelry",
    name: "Sienna",
    voiceId: VOICE_BELLA,
    role: "Massage Therapist"
  }
];

// Get or initialize counter from workflow static data
let counter = $getWorkflowStaticData('global').characterCounter || 0;

// Select current character
const character = characters[counter % characters.length];

// Increment counter for next run
$getWorkflowStaticData('global').characterCounter = counter + 1;

// Parse video length to milliseconds
const lengthMap = {
  "5 seconds": 5000,
  "10 seconds": 10000,
  "15 seconds": 15000
};
const durationMs = lengthMap[$json["Video Length"]] || 10000;

// Build the image prompt for Gemini
const backgroundMap = {
  "Luxury Spa Interior (Soft Lighting)": "luxurious med spa interior with warm ambient lighting, marble accents, and soft greenery in the background",
  "Clean Clinical (Modern White)": "modern clean clinical setting with white walls, sleek equipment, and professional medical aesthetic environment",
  "Elegant Treatment Room": "upscale treatment room with plush chair, calming colors, soft diffused lighting, and high-end skincare products visible",
  "Neutral Studio (Soft Glow)": "neutral studio background with soft golden glow lighting, clean and elegant"
};
const backgroundDesc = backgroundMap[$json["Background Style"]] || backgroundMap["Luxury Spa Interior (Soft Lighting)"];

const imagePrompt = `Create a high-quality, photorealistic portrait of a beautiful ${character.ethnicity} woman in her late 20s to early 30s, working as a ${character.role} at a luxury med spa.

Character details:
- Ethnicity: ${character.ethnicity}
- Hair: ${character.hairColor}, ${character.hairStyle}
- Skin tone: ${character.skinTone}
- Eyes: ${character.eyeColor}, warm and confident
- Outfit: ${character.outfit}
- Expression: warm, confident, approachable smile looking directly at camera
- Pose: head and shoulders portrait, facing forward

Style requirements:
- Ultra-realistic, high-end beauty photography quality
- Soft, flattering professional lighting
- ${backgroundDesc}
- Polished, luxurious aesthetic that conveys trust and expertise
- Clean, radiant skin that showcases the med spa brand
- Safe for all audiences
- High resolution, suitable for social media video

The image should look like a professional headshot from a luxury medical spa marketing campaign — elegant, trustworthy, and aspirational.`;

return [{
  json: {
    ...($json),
    character: character,
    imagePrompt: imagePrompt,
    durationMs: durationMs,
    backgroundStyle: $json["Background Style"],
    videoType: $json["Video Type"],
    topic: $json["Topic/Service"],
    customMessage: $json["Custom Message (Optional)"] || "",
    timestamp: new Date().toISOString()
  }
}];
